question: Translate from Russian into English. Я умею петь.
Translate from Russian into English. Вы должны навестить своих родителей.
choice1: You must come to see your parents.
choice2: You must to come to see your parents.
choice3: You must to come see your parents.
choice4: You to must come to see your parents.

question: Составьте отрицательное предложение из слов (Not, I, modest, am, person, a)
choice1: I not am a modest person.
choice2: I am a modest not person.
choice3: Am not I a modest person.
choice4: I am not a modest person.

question: Составьте утвердительное предложение из слов (Fine, today, is, weather, the)
... Earth is ... third planet of the Solar System.

... more you read ... more you know.
